title: Gothic Curiosities Curio Coffin Shelf - Wooden Goth Decor for Display or Storage of Shot Glasses, Mini Figures, Rocks, and More - 18.5 by 9.5 by 2.75 Inches (Pink)
features: GOTHIC DECOR might hold a special place in your heart. Coffin shelves will add that goth home decor touch to your bedroom, bathroom, or even kitchen.
GREAT IN PAIRS - You can put a coffin shelf on each side of your bed on the wall, or on each nightstand. Use it for your beauty supplies like small lipsticks or any other trinkets you might have.

GOOD THINGS COME IN SMALL PACKAGES - Make sure to check the images so that you can see the exact size. Its 18.5X9.5X2.75 inches. It comes with a hanger so you can put it on the wall, or on a flat surface
THINK OUTSIDE THE BOX - You life isn't a shaped like a square or rectangle, why should your gothic home decor be shaped so boring? This kawaii coffin wall shelf will wow all of your guests!

WHAT ELSE IS IN YOUR ROOM? Skull wall decor? A coffin bookshelf? A goth mirror? If you are into creepy, spooky, punk, dark, grunge, or any other thusly themed decorations, this will complete your look!
description: Many people want to have the perfect gothic room decor, so they buy huge things like a coffin book case, or a skull wall mirror, a gothic book shelf, or even coffin furniture, which will all set you back a pretty penny. Why not start simple with our coffin curio shelf? Whether you are into caskets, coffins, horror books, bloody decor, skulls, or anything else "out of the ordinary," don't let judgey people stifle your creativity. Men, Women, teenagers, it doesn't matter your age. Who DOESN'T have little nic nacks that would be perfect to display here. Don't get me wrong, I'm not trying to say you have to be a emo decor loving, satanic, witchy occult member in order to like this product. Look at the images of how it could be in the kitchen. Or on your makeup vanity, or maybe could house your bath soap in your bathroom next to your sink. The list goes on and on. But yeah, if your room already looks like it could be some victorian funeral parlor in the middle of halloween, the chances are that you are immediately attracted to this shelf.
